01CDFBEB.Line47.6DE47: You were bitter. You were uncertain.

091F8A44.Line13.6DE47: It’s hard for me to think about her right now. But then I remember you and Donan. You weren’t “all-knowing Horadrim.”

158C270A.Line37.6DE47: I know you don’t want to hear this, but you don’t get to quit. Not again.

27FD9937.Line7.6DE47: My mother would have wanted me to stay with you. She believed the Horadrim had all the answers.

294A5229.Line27.6DE47: I don’t know how much time I have, but there has to be a better answer. And I have to find it. Alone.

3D087D48.Line17.6DE47: That’s what I hold onto because there is so much further to go.

47AEBA84.Line31.6DE47: I know you’ll want to go with me.

5A202CB1.Line1.6DE47: I spent a lot of time learning this code, so I hope you remember how to read it, Lorath. Because you are the last Horadrim now.

67D98269.Line45.6DE47: We will never see each other again.

6F2B10C2.Line11.6DE47: I don’t know if she’d recognize this person I’m becoming.

7B97AD88.Line35.6DE47: If I’ve misjudged, the world is going to need you to survive and clean up the mistakes I leave behind.

A31403C6.Line15.6DE47: But you were always true friends.

C92992DE.VoiceDir1.6DE47: Neyrelle voiceover throughout as letter is read.

CDE508E7.Line43.6DE47: Wish me well, Lorath. Because if everything works out as I am hoping...

D6FCF6CA.Line19.6DE47: Your imperfection gave me hope. And we will need it to face what comes next.

E1A33406.Line33.6DE47: But people have already died because I was not careful enough. I can’t risk you too.
